## Read Text File

```{r read-text_file, warning=FALSE}

df <- data.frame()

con = file('data.txt', "r")
while (TRUE) {
  line = readLines(con, n = 1)
  
  if (length(line) == 0) {
     break
  }
  
  print(data.frame(line))
  df <- bind_rows(df, data.frame(line))
}

close(con)

```


processFile = function(filepath) {
  con = file(filepath, "r")
  while ( TRUE ) {
    line = readLines(con, n = 1)
    if ( length(line) == 0 ) {
      break
    }
    print(line)
  }

  close(con)
}
